languages.text: "You like it when the odds are stacked against you? Admirable. I accept the challenge."

traits.locale_text: "You like it when the odds are stacked against you? Admirable. I accept the challenge."
"You like it when the odds are stacked against you? Admirable. I accept the challenge."
"You like it when the odds are stacked against you? Admirable. I accept the challenge."
"You like it when the odds are stacked against you? Admirable. I accept the challenge."
"You like it when the odds are stacked against you? Admirable. I accept the challenge."

languages.text: 「不利な状況ほど燃えるタイプなのですか？見上げたものですね。その挑戦、受けましょう」
languages.original_text: "You like it when the odds are stacked against you? Admirable. I accept the challenge."

traits.locale_text: 「不利な状況ほど燃えるタイプなのですか？見上げたものですね。その挑戦、受けましょう」

languages.text: "Kazanma ihtimalinizi zorlaştırmayı seviyorsunuz. Bu yanınıza hayranım. Teklifinizi kabul ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "You like it when the odds are stacked against you? Admirable. I accept the challenge."

traits.locale_text: "Kazanma ihtimalinizi zorlaştırmayı seviyorsunuz. Bu yanınıza hayranım. Teklifinizi kabul ediyorum."

languages.text: «¿Le gusta tener las probabilidades en contra? Admirable. Acepto el reto».
languages.original_text: "You like it when the odds are stacked against you? Admirable. I accept the challenge."

traits.locale_text: «¿Le gusta tener las probabilidades en contra? Admirable. Acepto el reto».

languages.text: “你更喜欢挑战逆境吗？真是令人钦佩，我接受你的挑战。”
languages.original_text: "You like it when the odds are stacked against you? Admirable. I accept the challenge."

traits.locale_text: “你更喜欢挑战逆境吗？真是令人钦佩，我接受你的挑战。”

languages.text: « Manifestement, la difficulté ne vous fait pas peur et c'est tout à votre honneur. Je relève le défi. »
languages.original_text: "You like it when the odds are stacked against you? Admirable. I accept the challenge."

traits.locale_text: « Manifestement, la difficulté ne vous fait pas peur et c'est tout à votre honneur. Je relève le défi. »

languages.text: "Ihr mögt es, wenn alle Chancen gegen Euch sprechen, oder? Bewundernswert. Ich nehme die Herausforderung an."
languages.original_text: "You like it when the odds are stacked against you? Admirable. I accept the challenge."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr mögt es, wenn alle Chancen gegen Euch sprechen, oder? Bewundernswert. Ich nehme die Herausforderung an."
